title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another less than impressive performance in the preseason, Colin lays out what the realistic expectations should be for Trey Lance in his first season as the starting quarterback for the 49ers. He declares it's time to label this 3rd year QB as a bust despite what the head coach continues to tell us. He also gives the Steelers best approach to handling their rookie Kenny Pickett as they look for an answer to replace Ben Roethlisberger. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to give his thoughts on all the quarterbacks entering the 2022 season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
